posts.message:
Greetings, 
I want to build a "flights search engine" based on human language.
In other words, the user searches for "flights from Cairo to London today.", then the app should find all flights with "Source =Cairo", "destination = London", and "date = Time.Today".

What I have found so far, that this is related to NLP(Natural Language processing), which can do something like identifying of classes of entities within the sentence(determine if it's a location, date, person).

Now, I don't have a clear idea about what to do next, should i use regex intensively, or mix of if & else, or am I on the wrong track?
I would appreciate if you have samples or a simple tutorial to do such thing or more importantly, if there is no sample, ازاى ممكن افكر صح فى حاجة زى كده؟
note: the app will be asp.net, but samples in other languages are welcomed.
Sample of c# library: http://sharpnlp.codeplex.com/
